commentBody: Thanks for the litmus test on how bad a person I am: if I envy you, or really the ppl who can afford to do this without blinking, I am an insensitive .01 Per Center reveling in my position high above the masses.  If I immediately reflexively gag at the whole spectacle, even the boneless chicken wings and entrè to the Russian-billionaire-trolling-for-chicks lounge, I am noble.
